citation: Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (South Corridor from Elwick Road to Mentmore Street) Notice 2021 (Tas)
text:
Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (South Corridor from Elwick Road to Mentmore Street) Notice 2021

I make the following notice under section 6 of the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) Act 2016 .

28 January 2021

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (South Corridor from Elwick Road to Mentmore Street) Notice 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on 5 February 2021.

3. Declaration of strategic infrastructure corridor
    The area of land designated on Plan 10597 in the Central Plan Register to be land within a corridor is â€“
            (a) declared to be a strategic infrastructure corridor; and
            (b) assigned the name "South Corridor from Elwick Road to Mentmore Street".

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 January 2021

This notice is administered in the Department of State Growth.
